name: Sunlit Plateau
description:
The Sunlit Plateau is a savanna-like biome in Dreamlight Valley.

It is located on the west side of the Valley, connected to the Plaza and Forgotten Lands. It also contains the entrance to the Vitalys Mines, which unlocks during the quest Nature & Nurture.

The thorns blocking the pathway to this biome can be cleared using 7,000 Dreamlight.
